D1:1: Nate said:Hey Joanna! Long time no see! What's up? Anything fun going on?
D1:2: Joanna said:Hey Nate! Long time no see! I've been working on a project lately - it's been pretty cool. What about you - any fun projects or hobbies?
D1:3: Nate said:Hey Joanna! That's cool! I won my first video game tournament last week - so exciting!
D1:4: Joanna said:Wow Nate! Congrats on winning! Tell me more - what game was it?
D1:5: Nate said:Thanks! it's a team shooter game.
D1:6: Joanna said:Wow, great job! What was is called?
D1:7: Nate said:The game was called Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, and me and my team had a blast to the very end!
D1:8: Joanna said:Cool, Nate! Sounds like a fun experience, even if I'm not into games.
D1:9: Nate said:It was! How about you? Do you have any hobbies you love?
D1:10: Joanna said:Yeah! Besides writing, I also enjoy reading, watching movies, and exploring nature. Anything else you enjoy doing, Nate?
D1:11: Nate said:Playing video games and watching movies are my main hobbies.
D1:12: Joanna said:Cool, Nate! So we both have similar interests. What type of movies do you like best?
D1:13: Nate said:I love action and sci-fi movies, the effects are so cool! What about you, what's your favorite genre?
D1:14: Joanna said:I'm all about dramas and romcoms. I love getting immersed in the feelings and plots.
D1:15: Nate said:Wow, movies can be so powerful! Do you have any recommendations for me?
D1:16: Joanna said:Yeah, totally! Have you seen this romantic drama that's all about memory and relationships? It's such a good one.
D1:17: Nate said:Oh cool! I might check that one out some time soon! I do love watching classics.
D1:18: Joanna said:Yep, that movie is awesome. I first watched it around 3 years ago. I even went out and got a physical copy!
D1:19: Nate said:Sounds cool! Have you seen it a lot? sounds like you know the movie well!
D1:20: Joanna said:A few times. It's one of my favorites! I really like the idea and the acting.
D1:21: Nate said:Cool! I'll definitely check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
D1:22: Joanna said:No problem, Nate! Let me know if you like it!
D2:1: Joanna said:Hey Nate! Haven't talked in a few days. Crazy things happened to me!
D2:2: Nate said:Hi Joanna! Long time no see! What's been going on? You sound excited!
D2:3: Joanna said:Woo! I finally finished my first full screenplay and printed it last Friday. I've been working on for a while, such a relief to have it all done!
D2:4: Nate said:Wow, that sounds awesome! What's it about? Glad it's all down!
D2:5: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! It's a mix of drama and romance!
D2:6: Nate said:Wow, that's amazing! How do you feel now that it's finished? Do you have any new plans for it?
D2:7: Joanna said:Woohoo, Nate! I'm feeling a rollercoaster of emotions - relief, excitement, some anxiety - over finishing this project. Now I'm gonna submit it to some film festivals and (hopefully) get producers and directors to check it out. Here's hoping!
D2:8: Nate said:Congrats, Joanna! That sounds like a wild experience. Rock on and I hope they love it!
D2:9: Joanna said:Thanks Nate! A mix of emotions for sure. Hopefully, it leads to positive feedback and new opportunities.
D2:10: Nate said:Yeah, for sure. Hoping for the best! I like having some of these little ones around to keep me calm when things are super important and I'm nervous.
D2:11: Joanna said:Awww! How long have you had them?
D2:12: Nate said:I've had them for 3 years now and they bring me tons of joy!
D2:13: Joanna said:They sure lookl like they do! Adorable!
D2:14: Nate said:Thanks! The turtles might be small, but both sure have big personalities. I really reccomend having something like these little guys for times of stress.
D2:15: Joanna said:Good idea, Nate! I'll think about it and maybe get pets of my own soon if I can find any I'm not allergic to. Have you been up to anything recently?
D2:16: Nate said:Yeah actually! I start to hang out with some people outside of my circle at the tournament. They're pretty cool!
D2:17: Joanna said:Oh? That sounds sweet! Is it a weird relationship with them being competitors and all?
D2:18: Nate said:Oh, kind of. Some people are more competitive then others, so I tend to just stick around the more chill people here.
D2:19: Joanna said:That makes sense! Are you gonna cheer them on even if you lose?
D2:20: Nate said:Absolutely! I don't expect to win big here, I just like playing for fun!  You mentioned you were allergic to pets earlier, how bad is it?
D2:21: Joanna said:Oh, its really bad. My face gets all puffy and itchy when I'm around certain animals, so I've always just stayed away.
D2:22: Nate said:Sorry to hear that. Allergies can be tough. What specifically are you allergic to?
D2:23: Joanna said:I'm allergic to most reptiles and animals with fur. It can be a bit of a drag, but I find other ways to be happy.
D2:24: Nate said:Awesome! There are lots of things that can bring you joy without pets. What else brings you joy?
D2:25: Joanna said:Writing and hanging with friends! That way I can express myself through stories, or just have a good time with people.
D2:26: Nate said:That's great to hear! Those are both great things. I'm glad to hear you've got other things to help you get through times of axiousness despite not being able to have animals!
D2:27: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! Writing helps me create wild worlds with awesome characters. Plus, it's a great way to express my feelings. I can't imagine life without it.
D2:28: Nate said:Wow, Joanna, that sounds amazing! Keep doing what you love!
D2:29: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! I'll definitely keep pursuing my passion for writing. It means a lot.
D3:1: Joanna said:Hey Nate, long time no see! The screenplay I sent in to the film festival has been on my mind all day everyday. I keep bouncing between crazy emotions like relief, excitement and worry! Fingers crossed a producer or director falls in love with it and it ends up on the big screen - that would be awesome!
D3:2: Nate said:Hey Joanna! It is a big deal! I'm sure its been a wild ride. Sending some positive vibes and hoping someone likes it enough to get it on the big screen - that would be awesome!
D3:3: Joanna said:Thanks Nate, your support really means a lot. I put a lot of effort into it and I'm crossing my fingers. What about you? Anything new and exciting happening in your life?
D3:4: Nate said:Thanks, Joanna. Not much has changed for me, but I just discovered that I can make coconut milk icecream and gave it a try. It was actually pretty good, so I'm proud of myself.
D3:5: Joanna said:Looks delish! Glad you tried something new and it went well. What did you think of it?
D3:6: Nate said:Super good! It was rich and creamy - might be my new favorite snack!
D3:7: Joanna said:Great! I love when you try something new and it actually works out. Will you give it another go?
D3:8: Nate said:Yep, it could be fun! I'm looking forward to trying out different flavors and toppings.
D3:9: Joanna said:Yum! Sounds great. Got any favorite flavors for dairy-free desserts?
D3:10: Nate said:I love coconut milk, but I also enjoy chocolate and mixed berry flavors.
D3:11: Joanna said:Wow, those sound great! Who can say no to chocolate and berries? I'm tempted to try dairy-free flavors now!
D3:12: Nate said:Well I also made a dairy-free chocolate cake with berries on it the other day, maybe you would like that!
D3:13: Joanna said:Wow! That sounds yummy! You're so talented. Thanks for sharing your amazing creations! I should really try making one or just pay you a visit and try one for myself!
D3:14: Nate said:I couldn't agree more! It's always fun experimenting in the kitchen.
D3:15: Joanna said:I can tell! Your cooking skills are awesome. Seen any good movies lately?
D3:16: Nate said:Not recently. Any good ones you'd recommend?
D3:17: Joanna said:I just watched "Little Women" and it was amazing! It's a great story about sisterhood, love, and reaching for your dreams. Definitely a must-see!
D3:18: Nate said:Oh, that sounds like a great one! I'll definitely add it to my list. Thanks for the recommendation!
D3:19: Joanna said:Anytime! I'm always down to give movie reccomendations.
D3:20: Nate said:Good to know! I'll be sure to give you a shout whenever I run out of things to watch!
D3:21: Joanna said:Sounds great! Let me know what you think of it when your done!
D3:22: Nate said:You bet! You'll be the first to know.
D4:1: Nate said:Hey Joanna! Sorry I haven't been around. I made my friend some ice cream and they loved it!
D4:2: Joanna said:No worries, Nate! Glad to hear it. What flavor did you make?
D4:3: Nate said:I whipped up some chocolate and vanilla swirl.
D4:4: Joanna said:That looks delicious! Unfortunately, I can't have dairy, so no ice cream for me. Do you happen to have a dairy-free recipe that I could try?
D4:5: Nate said:Sure, I know one recipe using coconut milk. Would you like me to send it to you?
D4:6: Joanna said:Yeah, definitely! I'm keen to try your recipe. Always up for something sweet.
D4:7: Nate said:Cool, I'll do that. I'm all about these desserts, let me know what you think!
D4:8: Joanna said:Definitely keeping you posted! Love your creations!
D4:9: Nate said:Thanks, Joanna! It means a lot that you enjoy the desserts I bake.
D4:10: Joanna said:Yeah Nate, your cooking is amazing! I can't stop thinking about the screenplay, so I just started writing another one while I wait to hear back about how the first one did.
D4:11: Nate said:I hear that, taking your mind of something like that is very challenging. What's the new one about?
D4:12: Joanna said:It's about a thirty year old woman on a journey of self-discovery after a loss. Somewhat similar to the last one, but hey, that's just the kind of thing I'm inspired to write about!
D4:13: Nate said:Interesting! That's a deep topic. Love to hear more about it.
D4:14: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! It's my own story. The main character is dealing with some tough stuff: loss and trying to figure out who they are. They take a road trip to heal and grow.
D4:15: Nate said:Wow, Joanna, that sounds awesome. I love stories that tackle important issues. What inspired you to this one?
D4:16: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! It was inspired by personal experiences and my own journey of self-discovery.
D4:17: Nate said:Wow, Joanna, that takes guts! I can't wait to see it all come together. I'm also pumped to see how your first one will do!
D4:18: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! Appreciate your support. Hoping my screenplay gets noticed and makes it to the screen. Fingers crossed!
D4:19: Nate said:Crossing my fingers for you! Hope your screenplay finds a fan and is given its due. Good luck!
D5:1: Joanna said:Hey Nate, it's been a minute! I wrapped up my second script, and the feels have been wild. Sometimes I'm so relieved, but other times I just feel anxious about what comes next. It's a mix of excitement and terror, thinking about my work getting noticed and hitting the big screen.
D5:2: Nate said:Hey Joanna! Awesome to hear from you! Congrats on wrapping up a second one! All that hard work and dedication will definitely shine through and get noticed, no doubt. Hope you've been able to take some time to relax after everything!
D5:3: Joanna said:Thanks Nate! It's been a wild ride. I've been decompressing, but it's hard to switch off. There's always this tug-of-war of hope and doubt.
D5:4: Nate said:It's normal to have doubts, but you've worked hard and put tons of passion into it. Believe in yourself and things will work out. Here, look at this cute pic - walking them always reminds me to enjoy the small stuff!
D5:5: Joanna said:That pic's adorable! They always look so relaxed outside. What made you choose them as pets?
D5:6: Nate said:I'm drawn to turtles. They're unique and their slow pace is a nice change from the rush of life. They're also low-maintenance and calming. Check out this moment I snapped!
D5:7: Joanna said:They look so peaceful! It's amazing how these creatures bring so much calm and joy. Is taking care of them tough?
D5:8: Nate said:No, not really. Just keep their area clean, feed them properly, and make sure they get enough light. It's actually kind of fun.
D5:9: Joanna said:Sounds great! Having pets must be a wonderful experience.
D5:10: Nate said:Pets definitely bring tons of joy. They are always there for us and they're so cute! Relaxing with them is a great way to chill.
D5:11: Joanna said:I wish I wasn't allergic! I would get two turtles today if I could! I found out recently I'm allergic to cockroaches as well, so who knows if I'll ever get a pet.
D5:12: Nate said:Sorry! Maybe there are other animals you could consider! In the meantime though, I'll be sure to send you pics of my turtles so you can still watch them grow without getting too close.
D5:13: Joanna said:Great idea! I'm already really invested in those little guys!
D5:14: Nate said:Pets really seem to do that to everyone don't they! So, what about your script now? Any ideas for the next steps?
D5:15: Joanna said:I've been doing my fair share of research and networking non-stop for it. It's tough, but I'm determined to make it happen.
D5:16: Nate said:Great idea! that should hopefully get some more eyes on it. Keep up the hard work!
D5:17: Joanna said:Thanks so much, Nate! Your support means a lot. I'll keep working at it and hopefully the next steps will become clearer soon.
D5:18: Nate said:Just make sure you don't quit - the path forward will show up soon. You got this!
D5:19: Joanna said:Appreciated! I think just having someone to support me throughout the whole process is such a blessing. It gives me the motivation to keep pushing forward.
D5:20: Nate said:Glad to hear my support makes a difference, Joanna. I'm here for you!
D5:21: Joanna said:Always good to hear! See you later!
D6:1: Nate said:Hey Joanna! Long time no talk, how's it going? Crazy stuff's been happening since we last chatted.
D6:2: Joanna said:Hey Nate! Been quite a ride - in a good way - had an audition yesterday for a writing gig.
D6:3: Nate said:Congrats! How did it go? Are you excited?
D6:4: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! It went alright. Mixed emotions - definitely excited but also a bit anxious. Keep those fingers crossed!
D6:5: Nate said:Yeah, I get it. Mixed emotions are rough, but I have faith in you! Keep me posted - you got this!
D6:6: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! Your support means a lot. I'll make sure to keep you updated. Anything new on your end?
D6:7: Nate said:Yeah actually - I'm currently participating in the video game tournament again and it's INTENSE! There's so much adrenaline flowing.
D6:8: Joanna said:Best of luck in the tournament! It sounds like it would be difficult to go through so many days of intense gaming! This is my go-to place for writing inspiration. It helps me stay sharp and motivated.
D6:9: Nate said:Wow, that's a lot of books. Do you have any advice for someone like me who wants to pursue writing?
D6:10: Joanna said:Definitely! Read lots and try out different genres. Build a solid understanding of literature. Don't be afraid to write and share, even if it's just with friends. Practicing and gathering feedback will make you better. Have faith in yourself and continue following your writing dreams - it's tough but worth it.
D6:11: Nate said:Thanks, Joanna. Really appreciate your help and kind words. I'm going to keep working hard on it and see what happens. Good luck with your project, I'm sure it will turn out great!

D7:1: Nate said:Hey Jo, guess what I did? Dyed my hair last week - come see!

D8:1: Nate said:Hey Joanna! Haven't talked with you in a while - how's it going?
D8:2: Joanna said:Hey Nate! Great to hear from you. I've been reading a lot in the past week! There's a lot of good books I forgot I owned.

D8:11: Nate said:It's so crucial to find a little peace and remember life's beauty. For me, it's spending time with my pets and engaging in my hobbies; they let me take a break from reality. It's wild how small things can have such a powerful effect on our happiness, right?

D8:14: Joanna said:So cute! I love your turtles so much!

D8:20: Joanna said:Wow, sounds delicious! I'm going to try making it tonight! Thank you for sharing the recipe!
D8:21: Nate said:Hey Joanna, glad I could help. Let me know how it turns out!
D8:22: Joanna said:Got it, Nate. I'll definitely let you know how it turns out. Thanks for sharing the recipe!
D9:1: Joanna said:Hey Nate! Long time no talk! I wanted to tell ya I just joined a writers group. It's unbelievable--such inspirational people who really get my writing. I'm feeling so motivated and supported, it's like I finally belong somewhere!
D9:2: Nate said:Hey Joanna! That's awesome! Having a supportive group around you can really make a difference. What kind of projects are you working on with them?
D9:3: Joanna said:Thanks, Nate! We've made some great progress. I'm working on one with my group called "Finding Home." It's a script about a girl on a journey to find her true home. I find it really rewarding and emotional. What about you? Any upcoming gaming tournaments?
D9:4: Nate said:Hi Joanna! "Finding Home" sounds really special. Must be so meaningful to work on. I've got a gaming tournament next month and I'm feeling good about it. It's gonna be my 4th one!
D9:5: Joanna said:Yeah, I bet the nerves and excitement are quite a rush! I remember when I did my first play, I was so nervous I forgot my lines. It was embarrassing, but it taught me how important it is to prepare and stay in the moment.

D9:8: Nate said:Go for it! Follow your passion for writing, but if acting really makes you happy, give it a shot as well. Who knows what'll happen! Any particular movies that spark your writing?
D9:9: Joanna said:Thanks Nate! I'm gonna keep writing, but if acting calls out I might give it a try. I really enjoy dramas and emotionally-driven films. What about you? What inspires your passion?
D9:10: Nate said:I love fantasy and sci-fi movies, they're a great escape and get my imagination going. Playing video games is a great way to express my creativity and passion.
D9:11: Joanna said:That's awesome! I love how video games can really spark your imagination. Do you have a favorite fantasy or sci-fi movie?
D9:12: Nate said:Yeah, for sure! This trilogy is one of my faves. The world building, battles, and storytelling always blow me away!
D9:13: Joanna said:Wow, that's great to hear! What books do you enjoy? I'm always up for some new book recommendations.
D9:14: Nate said:I love this series. It has adventures, magic, and great characters - it's a must-read!
D9:15: Joanna said:Heard of that series! It's been on my list forever. Thanks for the recommendation, Nate. I'm definitely going to check it out!
D9:16: Nate said:No problem, glad to see an interest. Let me know what you think when you check it out.
D9:17: Joanna said:Thanks Nate! I'll definitely let you know my thoughts. Take care and have a great day!
D9:18: Nate said:See you! Good chatting with you! Have a great day!

D11:1: Joanna said:Hey Nate! Great to hear from you! Quite a week since we last talked - something awesome happened to me!

D23:1: Nate said:Hey Joanna, it's been a couple days since we last talked. Something exciting happened last Friday. I went to a game convention and met new people who weren't from my normal circle. It was a bit overwhelming but it reminded me of the good times gaming can bring.

D23:5: Nate said:I also met some people who also played this boardgame I love, so I joined in. We had a lot in common and hit it off. It's great when shared hobbies can bond people!

D23:11: Nate said:It was great! Playing games is my escape from life struggles, so I generally don't get crazy competitive over them. The people at the convention were the same way!
D23:12: Joanna said:Glad you found a way to have fun and escape! It's important to stay happy and de-stress. Keep doing what makes you happy!
D23:13: Nate said:For sure! You should go to a writing convention or something sometime! The experience at this convention is unforgetable.
D23:14: Joanna said:Do writing conventions exist? I'll have to look into that, it could be fun! Thanks for the idea. Have you been up to anything tonight?
D23:15: Nate said:Mostly just chilling at home. Playing video games or watching movies helps me unwind.
D23:16: Joanna said:That sounds great! What's your favorite game or movie that you've seen recently?
D23:17: Nate said:I recently saw a movie that blew my mind with all the twists and dream stuff, I think it was called "Inception". I've also been playing a game nonstop with a great futuristic setting and gameplay called "Cyberpunk 2077". Have you seen or played anything good lately?
D23:18: Joanna said:I watched a classic movie the other day that was awesome - the story was so gripping and the actors were great! It really stuck with me.

D23:26: Joanna said:Sure! For one, you should get a couch that can sit multiple people so that you can lay down if you want, and make sure its really fluffy! Also invest in a blanket that has a little bit of weight to it, and some lights that can be dimmed.
D23:27: Nate said:Sounds like you really got into making your living room! Thanks, I'll try that out for myself!
D23:28: Joanna said:No problem! I get super invested in random little things like that, but I think its all worth it when I end up with random little things that make life so much nicer.

D25:1: Nate said:Hey Joanna, what's been up since we last chatted? How's it going?

I felt a mix of emotions, but overall, it was a satisfying moment. I've been waiting for this for a long time!

D26:1: Joanna said:Wow, Nate, I'm on fire! I just set up meetings with movie producers — my dreams are comin' true!
